name: Black Out (Emil_Rusboi)
description:
Hello observer! TV-head people are trying to escape the prison. Your task is pretty simple - stop them!

Small pixel game with black and white style. You click on the TV-head people to stop them. There are several types of TV-head people, each with unique ability. Towers make them slow.

Small campaign of 5 days with 2 endings + Endless mode

Controls:
ESC - leave the game at any moment

Credits;

@Catfish - Music & SFX

@WilsonDoesStuff - Music
